```{r setup}
library(RNAPerm)

```


```{r}
### Generate data from NB distribution and put into array
Y <- rnbinom(80*1000, mu = 10, size = 1/0.2)
Y <- data.frame(array(Y, dim = c(80, 1000)))
X <- as.factor(rep(c("A", "B"), each = 40))
```



```{r}

```

```{r}
hist(ClassicPermTest(X, Y, 1000), breaks = 100)
```
